messages.message:
Hi team
I am facing a weird issue. In my PR https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/70999
When I run PIAs I don't see the logs from the python code. Only from the driver shell script.
I didn't do any logging changes, but not able to figure out why this is happening.
https://test-sitaram.internal.instabase.com/deployment-manager/dashboard/jobs/batch/v1/job-pos[…]up-wlh7g/logs/post-install-action-test-runner-setup (https://test-sitaram.internal.instabase.com/deployment-manager/dashboard/jobs/batch/v1/job-post-install-action-test-runner-setup/job-post-install-action-test-runner-setup-wlh7g/logs/post-install-action-test-runner-setup)

Okay so I tried deploying master branch to my another standalone sandbox. That also doesn't show logs.
So definitely nothing to do with my PR
Yeah I’ve always found python logging to be finicky, you might need to play around with it or check how the other python PIAs do it

I mean it works already on existing sandboxes/prod tenants.
It stopped in my standalone sandbox with my PR and now even with Master.
Tried tenant sandbox with my PR still same issue
Looks like it stopped logging in aihub-sandbox on May 27 UTC…
